ch.zhaw.ba10_bsha_1.ime
Class LatinKeyboard

java.lang.Object
  Keyboard
      ch.zhaw.ba10_bsha_1.ime.LatinKeyboard

public class LatinKeyboard
extends Keyboard

Implementation of a Latin Keyboard for our IME. Creates its keyboard layout from an XML file but is just used to plant our PadView on top of it here. Have a look at the SoftKeyboard example in the SDK to see how it would be done properly. Copied from the SoftKeyboard example from the Android SDK without modifications.
